member.name: T:TagsControl.Models.TagItem
member.summary: Represents a single tag item with display name and value properties. This model is used to store information about individual tags in the TagsControl.
member.remarks: The TagItem class provides a simple data structure for tags that can be displayed in the UI and managed through the TagsControl. It supports both display text (DisplayName) and an internal value (Value) for identification purposes.

member.name: P:TagsControl.Models.TagItem.DisplayName
member.summary: Gets or sets the text to display in tag
member.remarks: This property represents the user-facing text that will be displayed on the tag in the UI. It's used for visual identification of the tag.

member.name: P:TagsControl.Models.TagItem.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the string value
member.remarks: This property represents an internal identifier for the tag. It can be used to uniquely identify tags in data processing and is particularly useful when working with databases or APIs.

member.name: M:TagsControl.Models.TagItem.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TagItem class with specified display name and value.
member.param: The text to display in the tag
The internal string value for identification
member.remarks: This constructor allows creating a new tag with both display name and value properties set at initialization time.

member.name: T:TagsControl.TagsControl
member.summary: A user control for managing tags in the application. Provides functionality to add, remove, and edit tags with visual feedback.
member.remarks: This control allows users to manage collections of tags through a user-friendly interface. It supports adding tags by typing and selecting from suggestions, removing individual tags, and provides color-coded visualization for better organization.
member.summary: TagsControl

member.name: F:TagsControl.TagsControl.ItemsSourceProperty
member.summary: DependencyProperty for Source of Tags to selection
member.remarks: This property represents the collection of available tags that can be selected. It is used to populate the auto-complete suggestions as the user types.

member.name: F:TagsControl.TagsControl.SelectedTagsProperty
member.summary: DependencyProperty of Source of selected Tags
member.remarks: This property represents the collection of currently selected tags. It supports two-way data binding and updates the UI when changed.

member.name: F:TagsControl.TagsControl.TagsBackgroundBrushesProperty
member.summary: DependencyProperty for Background of inner Border
member.remarks: This property controls the background brushes used for tag visualization. It allows customization of tag colors through a collection of Brush objects.

member.name: F:TagsControl.TagsControl.BorderCornerRadiusProperty
member.summary: DependencyProperty for CornerRadius of outer Border
member.remarks: This property controls the corner radius of the outer border of the control. It allows for rounded corners on the entire control container.

member.name: F:TagsControl.TagsControl.InnerBorderBrushProperty
member.summary: DependencyProperty for BorderBrush inner Border
member.remarks: This property controls the border brush of the inner elements in the control. It defines the color of the border around the tag container and suggestions.

member.name: F:TagsControl.TagsControl.InnerBorderThicknessProperty
member.summary: DependencyProperty for BorderThickness of inner Border
member.remarks: This property controls the thickness of the border around inner elements. It defines how thick the border appears around the tag container and suggestions.

member.name: F:TagsControl.TagsControl.InnerBackgroundProperty
member.summary: DependencyProperty for Background of inner Border
member.remarks: This property controls the background color of the inner elements in the control. It defines the background color of the tag container and suggestions panel.

member.name: P:TagsControl.TagsControl.TagsBackgroundBrushes
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of background brushes for tags
member.remarks: This property allows customization of tag colors. When set, it overrides the default color palette. The control will cycle through these brushes when assigning colors to new tags.

member.name: P:TagsControl.TagsControl.BorderCornerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the corner radius for the outer border
member.remarks: This property controls the roundness of the control's outer border. A value of 0 means sharp corners, while higher values create more rounded corners.

member.name: P:TagsControl.TagsControl.InnerBorderThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of the inner border
member.remarks: This property controls how thick the border appears around the tag container and suggestions.

member.name: P:TagsControl.TagsControl.InnerBorderBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush for the inner border
member.remarks: This property controls the color of the border around the tag container and suggestions.

member.name: P:TagsControl.TagsControl.InnerBackground
member.summary: Gets or sets the background for inner elements
member.remarks: This property controls the background color of the tag container and suggestions panel.

member.name: M:TagsControl.TagsControl.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TagsControl class
member.remarks: This constructor initializes the control's UI elements and sets up event handlers. It creates the input TextBox programmatically and configures its properties.

member.name: M:TagsControl.TagsControl.ClickArea_MouseDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles mouse down events on the click area to focus the input textbox
member.remarks: This method ensures that clicking anywhere in the control focuses the input field, except when clicking directly on a tag or delete button.

member.name: M:TagsControl.TagsControl.IsInsideTagOrDeleteButton(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Determines if the mouse event occurred inside a tag or delete button
member.param: The dependency object that triggered the event
member.returns: True if the event occurred inside a tag or delete button, false otherwise

member.name: M:TagsControl.TagsControl.FocusInputTextBox
member.summary: Sets focus to the input text box and positions the cursor at the end of the text

member.name: P:TagsControl.TagsControl.ItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of available tags for selection
member.remarks: This property represents the source data that populates the auto-complete suggestions. It should be an IEnumerable of TagItem objects.

member.name: P:TagsControl.TagsControl.SelectedTags
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of currently selected tags
member.remarks: This property represents the collection of tags that are currently selected. It supports two-way data binding and updates the UI when changed.

member.name: M:TagsControl.TagsControl.OnItemsSourceChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles changes to the ItemsSource property

member.name: M:TagsControl.TagsControl.OnSelectedTagsChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles changes to the SelectedTags property

member.name: M:TagsControl.TagsControl.OnTagsBackgroundBrushesChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles changes to the TagsBackgroundBrushes property

member.name: M:TagsControl.TagsControl.SelectedTags_CollectionChanged(System.Object,System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles collection change events for selected tags

member.name: M:TagsControl.TagsControl.UpdateTagsUI
member.summary: Updates the user interface to reflect current tag selections
member.remarks: This method rebuilds the UI by clearing existing tags and recreating them based on the SelectedTags collection. It also ensures that the input textbox is always positioned at the end of the tag container.

member.name: M:TagsControl.TagsControl.CreateTagChip(TagsControl.Models.TagItem)
member.summary: Creates a visual representation of a tag chip
member.param: The tag item to create a chip for
member.returns: A Border control representing the tag chip

member.name: M:TagsControl.TagsControl.GetDeterministicBrush(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a deterministic brush color for a tag based on its display name
member.param: The display name of the tag
member.returns: A Brush object representing the color for this tag

member.name: M:TagsControl.TagsControl.GetContrastColor(System.Windows.Media.Brush)
member.summary: Calculates the appropriate text color for contrast against a background brush
member.param: The background brush to calculate contrast for
member.returns: A Color that provides good contrast with the background

member.name: M:TagsControl.TagsControl.GetStableHash(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a stable hash for a string input

member.summary: Handles click events on delete buttons for tags

member.summary: Handles text change events in the input textbox
